update meeting set CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_WRITE_CALEDNAR = #{isWriteCalednar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MEET_NAME = #{meetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESEND_HOUR = #{resendHour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESEND_MINUTE = #{resendMinute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESEND_SEVERAL = #{resendSeveral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SMS2_REMIND = #{sms2Remind,jdbcType=CHAR}, SMS_REMIND = #{smsRemind,jdbcType=CHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_ID = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MEET_ROOM_ID = #{meetRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UID = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RECORDER_ID = #{recorderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISUPLOADSUMMARY = #{isuploadsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_NO = #{mobileNo} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM meeting
and MEET_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{meetingWithBLOBs.meetName},'%')
and TO_DAYS(START_TIME) >= TO_DAYS(str_to_date(#{meetingWithBLOBs.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H'))
and TO_DAYS(START_TIME) <= TO_DAYS(str_to_date(#{meetingWithBLOBs.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H'))
and MEET_ROOM_ID=#{meetingWithBLOBs.meetRoomId}
and status NOT in (1,4) and (UID=#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid} or RECORDER_ID=#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid} OR ATTENDEE LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid},',%') OR ATTENDEE LIKE CONCAT(#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid},',%'))
order by START_TIME desc
SELECT * from meeting where SID=#{sid}
mapper.update:
update meeting
MEET_NAME=#{meetName},SUBJECT=#{subject},UID=#{uid},RECORDER_ID=#{recorderId},CREATE_TIME=#{createTime}, START_TIME=#{startTime},END_TIME=#{endTime},MEET_ROOM_ID=#{meetRoomId},UID=#{uid},MOBILE_NO=#{mobileNo}, MANAGER_ID=#{managerId},ATTENDEE=#{attendee},ATTENDEE_OUT=#{attendeeOut},EQUIPMENT_IDS=#{equipmentIds}, EQUIPMENT_NAMES=#{equipmentNames},IS_WRITE_CALEDNAR=#{isWriteCalednar},SMS_REMIND=#{smsRemind}, RESEND_HOUR=#{resendHour},RESEND_MINUTE=#{resendMinute},MEET_DESC=#{meetDesc},SMS2_REMIND=#{sms2Remind}, ATTACHMENT_ID=#{attachmentId},ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{attachmentName},VIDEO_CONF_FLAG=#{videoConfFlag}, SERVICE_USER = #{serviceUser},PHOTO_ID = #{photoId}, PHOTO_NAME = #{photoName}, VIDEO_ID = #{videoId}, AGENDA_ID = #{agendaId}, AGENDA_NAME = #{agendaName},
SIGN_IN_TIME = #{signInTime},
STATUS = #{status},
where SID = #{sid}

update meeting
MEET_NAME=#{meetName},
SUBJECT=#{subject},
UID=#{uid},
MOBILE_NO=#{mobileNo},
ATTENDEE=#{attendee},
START_TIME=#{startTime},
WHERE SID=#{sid}

update meeting set MEET_NAME=#{meetName},SUBJECT=#{subject},"UID"=#{uid},RECORDER_ID=#{recorderId},CREATE_TIME=to_date(#{createTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), START_TIME=to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),END_TIME=to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),MEET_ROOM_ID=#{meetRoomId}, MANAGER_ID=#{managerId},ATTENDEE=#{attendee},ATTENDEE_OUT=#{attendeeOut},EQUIPMENT_IDS=#{equipmentIds}, EQUIPMENT_NAMES=#{equipmentNames},IS_WRITE_CALEDNAR=#{isWriteCalednar},SMS_REMIND=#{smsRemind}, RESEND_HOUR=#{resendHour},RESEND_MINUTE=#{resendMinute},MEET_DESC=#{meetDesc},SMS2_REMIND=#{sms2Remind}, ATTACHMENT_ID=#{attachmentId},ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{attachmentName},SERVICE_USER = #{serviceUser}, SIGN_IN_TIME = #{signInTime} WHERE SID=#{sid}

update meeting set MEET_NAME=#{meetName},SUBJECT=#{subject},"UID"=#{uid},RECORDER_ID=#{recorderId},CREATE_TIME=to_date(#{createTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), START_TIME=to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),END_TIME=to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),MEET_ROOM_ID=#{meetRoomId}, MANAGER_ID=#{managerId},ATTENDEE=#{attendee},ATTENDEE_OUT=#{attendeeOut},EQUIPMENT_IDS=#{equipmentIds}, EQUIPMENT_NAMES=#{equipmentNames},IS_WRITE_CALEDNAR=#{isWriteCalednar},SMS_REMIND=#{smsRemind}, RESEND_HOUR=#{resendHour},RESEND_MINUTE=#{resendMinute},MEET_DESC=#{meetDesc},SMS2_REMIND=#{sms2Remind}, ATTACHMENT_ID=#{attachmentId},ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{attachmentName},SERVICE_USER = #{serviceUser}, SIGN_IN_TIME = #{signInTime} WHERE SID=#{sid}

update meeting
VIDEO_CONF_ID=#{videoConfId},
MEET_CODE=#{meetCode},
WHERE SID=#{sid}

mapper.select:
SELECT m.* FROM meeting m where
1=1
1=1
and ((ATTENDEE LIKE concat('%,',#{id},',%') OR ATTENDEE LIKE concat(#{id},',%') )OR (ATTENDEE_OUT LIKE concat('%,',#{id},',%') OR ATTENDEE_OUT LIKE concat(#{id},',%') )OR (RECORDER_ID = #{id} OR RECORDER_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{id},',%') OR RECORDER_ID LIKE concat(#{id},',%') ) )
ORDER BY m.START_TIME DESC

SELECT * FROM meeting
RECORDER_ID =#{id} OR READ_PEOPLE_ID like concat(concat('%,',#{id}), ',%') OR READ_PEOPLE_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{id},',%')

SELECT * FROM meeting
RECORDER_ID =#{id} OR READ_PEOPLE_ID like concat(concat('%,',#{id}), ',%') OR READ_PEOPLE_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{id},',%')
mapper.update:

SID=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from meeting where MEET_ROOM_ID=#{meetRoomId} and STATUS=2 and VIDEO_CONF_FLAG = '0'
and ( ( START_TIME < CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME > CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) ) OR ( START_TIME < CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME > CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) ) OR ( START_TIME > CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME < CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) ) OR ( START_TIME < CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME > CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) ) OR ( START_TIME = CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME = CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) ) )

SELECT * FROM meeting
STATUS IN (2,3)
and MEET_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{meetingWithBLOBs.meetName},'%')
and START_TIME >= #{meetingWithBLOBs.startTime}
and START_TIME <= #{meetingWithBLOBs.endTime}
and (UID=#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid} or RECORDER_ID=#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid} OR ATTENDEE LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid},',%') OR ATTENDEE LIKE CONCAT(#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid},',%') OR (SERVICE_USER = #{meetingWithBLOBs.uid} OR SERVICE_USER LIKE concat('%,',#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid},',%') OR SERVICE_USER LIKE concat(#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid},',%')))
order by CREATE_TIME desc

SELECT * FROM meeting
STATUS IN (2,3)
and MEET_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{meetingWithBLOBs.meetName}),'%')
and START_TIME >= #{meetingWithBLOBs.startTime}
and START_TIME <= #{meetingWithBLOBs.endTime}
and (UID=#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid} or RECORDER_ID=#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid} OR ATTENDEE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%,',#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid}),',%') OR ATTENDEE LIKE CONCAT(#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid},',%') OR (SERVICE_USER = #{meetingWithBLOBs.uid} OR SERVICE_USER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%,',#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid}),',%') OR SERVICE_USER LIKE CONCAT(#{meetingWithBLOBs.uid},',%')))
order by CREATE_TIME desc
SELECT m.* ,r.managerIds from meeting as m LEFT JOIN meeting_room AS r ON m.MEET_ROOM_ID = r.SID where m.SID=#{sid}

SELECT COUNT( SID ) FROM meeting WHERE ( ( START_TIME < CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME > CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) ) OR ( START_TIME < CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME > CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) ) OR ( START_TIME > CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME < CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) ) OR ( START_TIME < CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME > CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) ) OR ( START_TIME = CAST(#{startTime} AS datetime) AND END_TIME = CAST(#{endTime} AS datetime) ) ) AND ( STATUS = 1 OR STATUS = 2 OR STATUS = 3 ) AND MEET_ROOM_ID = #{roomId} AND ( VIDEO_CONF_FLAG = '0' OR VIDEO_CONF_FLAG IS NULL OR VIDEO_CONF_FLAG = '' )
SELECT count(SID) FROM meeting WHERE END_TIME > #{startTime} AND START_TIME < #{endTime} AND (`STATUS` = 1 OR `STATUS` = 2 OR `STATUS` = 3) AND MEET_ROOM_ID = #{roomId} and VIDEO_CONF_FLAG = '0'
mapper.update:
update meeting
READ_PEOPLE_ID = #{readPeopleId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
SUMMARY=#{summary},
PHOTO_ID = #{photoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHOTO_NAME = #{photoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIDEO_ID = #{videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIDEO_NAME = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_ID = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_NAME = #{recordName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUMMARY_ATTACHMENT_ID=#{summaryAttachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUMMARY_ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{summaryAttachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_ID=#{attachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SID=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update meeting
READ_PEOPLE_ID = #{readPeopleId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
SUMMARY=#{summary},
PHOTO_ID = #{photoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHOTO_NAME = #{photoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIDEO_ID = #{videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIDEO_NAME = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_ID = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_NAME = #{recordName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUMMARY_ATTACHMENT_ID=#{summaryAttachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUMMARY_ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{summaryAttachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_ID=#{attachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SID=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update meeting set STATUS= 5 WHERE SID=#{sid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEETING WHERE CYCLE = 1 GROUP BY CYCLE_NO
SELECT * FROM MEETING WHERE CYCLE = 1 AND CYCLE_NO = #{cycleNo}
SELECT ifnull(max(cycle_no),0) FROM meeting

SELECT * FROM meeting m
AND ( (ATTENDEE LIKE concat('%',#{uid},'%') OR ATTENDEE LIKE concat(#{uid},'%')) OR (ATTENDEE_OUT LIKE concat('%',#{uid},'%') OR ATTENDEE_OUT LIKE concat(#{uid},'%') ) OR (RECORDER_ID = #{uid} OR RECORDER_ID LIKE concat('%',#{uid},'%') OR RECORDER_ID LIKE concat(#{uid},'%') ) OR (SERVICE_USER = #{uid} OR SERVICE_USER LIKE concat('%',#{uid},'%') OR SERVICE_USER LIKE concat(#{uid},'%') ) OR UID = #{uid} ) and STATUS in (2,3,5)
order by START_TIME desc

select,
from meeting where STATUS in (2,3) and ((ATTENDEE LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR ATTENDEE LIKE concat(#{userId},',%') )OR (ATTENDEE_OUT LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR ATTENDEE_OUT LIKE concat(#{userId},',%') )) order by CREATE_TIME desc
select SID,START_TIME,END_TIME,STATUS,REASON from meeting where STATUS in (2,3)
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(USER_ID) FROM `user` WHERE USER_PRIV = #{i} OR USER_PRIV_OTHER like CONCAT('%,', #{i} ,',%') OR USER_PRIV_OTHER like CONCAT(#{i} ,',%')
select SID, START_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS from meeting where STATUS in (2,3)
mapper.update: update meeting set CREATE_QRCODE_TIME=#{createQrcodeTime} where SID=#{sid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM meeting WHERE MEET_ROOM_ID = #{meetRoomId} AND STATUS != 4 AND ( ( #{startDate} >= START_TIME AND #{startDate} < END_TIME ) OR ( #{endDate} > START_TIME AND #{endDate} <= END_TIME ) OR ( #{startDate} < START_TIME AND #{endDate} > END_TIME ) )
